thread.title: Richmond Mutual Bancorporation, Inc. Profit Rises In Q4
thread.title_full: Richmond Mutual Bancorporation, Inc. Profit Rises In Q4

author: RTTNews Staff Writer
title: Richmond Mutual Bancorporation, Inc. Profit Rises In Q4
text:
Richmond Mutual Bancorporation, Inc. (RMBI) announced earnings for its fourth quarter that increased from the same period last year
The company's earnings came in at $2.48 million, or $0.24 per share. This compares with $1.94 million, or $0.19 per share, last year.
The company's revenue for the period rose 5.7% to $9.86 million from $9.33 million last year.
Richmond Mutual Bancorporation, Inc. earnings at a glance (GAAP) :
-Earnings: $2.48 Mln. vs. $1.94 Mln. last year.-EPS: $0.24 vs. $0.19 last year.-Revenue: $9.86 Mln vs. $9.33 Mln last year.
For comments and feedback contact: editorial@rttnews.com
Business News
January 17, 2025 12:39 ET The consumer price inflation report from the U.S. was the highlight of the week that markets eyed closely to gain some insight on the Fed policy outlook. The U.S. economy also had several indicators and survey data being released during the week that revealed trends in manufacturing and housing, among others. In Europe, economic output data from the biggest euro economy – Germany, was in focus. Chinese foreign trade figures, especially exports, gained attention in Asia.
